edu.wpi.disco

Class Disco

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cetask.TaskEngine
      • edu.wpi.disco.Disco

  • public class Disco
extends TaskEngine
    Collaborative Discourse Manager (see papers in docs). NB: This implementation does not support multi-threaded access. See Interaction for multi-thread support.

    • Field Detail

      • VERSION

        public static java.lang.String VERSION

      • TRACE

        public static boolean TRACE
        To enabled tracing of Disco implementation. Note this variable can be conveniently set using eval command in console or in init script of a task model.

        protected final java.util.Properties translate

      • setFocus

        @Deprecated
public boolean setFocus(Plan focus)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: TaskEngine
        Shift focus to the given plan or null.
        Overrides:
        setFocus in class TaskEngine
        Returns:
        true iff this is an "unexpected focus shift" in the sense of Lesh, Rich & Sidner's UM'01 paper, i.e., we are leaving the current focus when it is started but not done.
        See Also:
        TaskEngine.getFocus()

        public void popTo(Plan plan)

      • resolveAmbiguity

      • explain

        @Deprecated
public java.util.List<Plan> explain(Task task,
                                      boolean onlyLive)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: TaskEngine
        Return list of plans in task tree which explain given task, searching in the following categories, in order:
        1. within current focus
        2. within current toplevel plan
        3. any toplevel plan
        If plans are found in one category, search does not continue to next category.
        Overrides:
        explain in class TaskEngine
        onlyLive - only search live plans

      • interpret

        protected boolean interpret(Task occurrence,
                Plan contributes,
                boolean continuation)
        Description copied from class: TaskEngine
        Update engine state based on this occurrence.
        Overrides:
        interpret in class TaskEngine
        contributes - plan to which occurrence contributes (e.g., matches) or null
        continuation - true iff contributes plan started before this occurrence
        Returns:
        false iff this task is unexplained
        See Also:
        Task.interpret(Plan,boolean)

      • getAlternative

        public java.lang.String getAlternative(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value,
                              boolean advance)
        Utility function for sequencing through alternatives using | separators (which may be quoted with backslash). Used for task formatting strings, translation tables and Say.
        Parameters:
        key - base used to store alternatives counter in user model
        value - string with alternatives (may have only one)
        advance - whether to advance count afterward
        Returns:
        chosen alternative
